translations: 使……靠边；从事副业（sideline 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 袖手旁观；置身局外；不参与

sentences.sentence: This means sidelining corporate cluck-cluckers such as lawyers who worry that any admission of guilt will lead to lawsuits.
sentences.translation: 这意味着公司里的杞人忧天者，例如律师这样担心承认任何过失都可能导致法律诉讼，要靠边了。

sentences.sentence: Instead of sidelining her, regret became just one more springboard.
sentences.translation: 她的遗憾并没有让她退在一旁，反倒成为了另一个跳板。

sentences.sentence: Companies, meanwhile, are investing in "emerging markets" and sidelining the developed world.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，公司们也正投身于“新兴市场”而旁落了发达国家。
